MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Pollock. We are aware of multiple power cuts in your area today and we apologise for this. Our team have been working on site throughout the night to restore supplies and are investigating a possible underground cable fault outside 73 Kempsthorn Crescent. We will continue to work to repair the fault and we expect to restore supplies as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:22am on Thursday, 24 December 2020
